DataElement.preferredName: Medical Outcomes Study Your Feelings Questionnaire Past Month How Much of the Time Have You Felt Cheerful or Lighthearted Score 6 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated perception of how much of the time they have felt cheerful or lighthearted during the past month, using a 6 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Medical Outcomes Study Your Feelings Questionnaire Past Month How Much of the Time Have You Felt Cheerful or Lighthearted Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A survey of multiple dimensions of functioning and well being, representing the feelings scale._Past; before the present time._One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks._A question about how much of the time something is occurring or has occurred._A question about whether an individual feels or felt cheerful or lighthearted._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Medical Outcomes Study Your Feelings Questionnaire
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A survey of multiple dimensions of functioning and well being, representing the feelings scale.

Concepts.longName: Medical Outcomes Study Your Feelings Questionnaire

Concepts.definition: One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.
A question about how much of the time something is occurring or has occurred.

Concepts.longName: Have You Felt Cheerful or Lighthearted
Concepts.definition: A question about whether an individual feels or felt cheerful or lighthearted.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
